name: Jaime L. Garcia
text: To be clear, dying here means shutting off as if it had 0% power, though the indicator showed 20%. True enough, purchasing a new battery fixed the problem, and the bulge is quite evident when you compare the batteries side by side.

source_obj.text: To be clear, dying here means shutting off as if it had 0% power, though the indicator showed 20%. True enough, purchasing a new battery fixed the problem, and the bulge is quite evident when you compare the batteries side by side.
